meanings: (남에게 어떤 일을 하게 하다) make[have, let](sb do), get (sb to do), (원하지 않는 일을 강제로) force[compel] (sb to do), (지...
be unable to eat tteok, rice cake, that falls into one's lap

vlive.korean: '회사에서 안 시켜 줄 뿐' 염색? "Just the company won't let you?" Dying my hair? 듣기 View video OH MY GIRL : 씅춘천가요

vlive.korean: 또 뭐 시켜줄 거야? Are you going to make me do something? 듣기 View video fromis_9 : 수박 언박싱🍉

vlive.korean: '반대로 생각을 해보면 경험하지 못했던 새로운 경험을 시켜줄 수 있지 않을까요?' "If you think oppositely, wouldn't it allow to provide new experiences?" 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [FULL] HAYOUNG X LieV - 하영의 눕방라이브!
vlive.english: "If you think oppositely, wouldn't it allow to provide new experiences?"

vlive.korean: 면봉을 이용해서 정돈을 시켜줄 거예요. I'm going to use a cotton swab to tidy them up. 듣기 View video WIWO : 봄 로맨틱 히피 메이크업 /Spring romantic hippie
vlive.english: I'm going to use a cotton swab to tidy them up.

examples.korean: Teachers need to prepare their students to deal with real-world situations outside the classroom. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 교사들은 학생들이 교실 밖 실세계 상황에 대처할 수 있도록 대비를 시켜 줄 필요가 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Teachers need to prepare their students to deal with real-world situations outside the classroom. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Perfect. We'll have time to give him a tour of the plant before going to lunch. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 잘됐네요. 그럼 점심 먹으러 가기 전에 공장 견학을 시켜 줄 시간이 되겠어요. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Perfect. We'll have time to give him a tour of the plant before going to lunch. Add to Wordbook
